channel.title: One Year Bible Podcast
channel.itunes:author: One Year Bible
channel.itunes:subtitle: Daily Bible Reading
channel.description: Listen to the entire Bible in a year - Join us each day for Bible readings broadcast daily from Atlanta, Georgia. Visit us on the web at www.oneyearbiblepodcast.com
